text: Aap keh dijiye kay agar tumharay baap aur tumharay larkay aur tumharay bhai aur tumhari biwiyan aur tumharay kunbay qabeelay aur tumharay kamaye huye maal aur woh tijarat jiss ki kami say tum dartay ho aur woh hawayliyan jinehn tum pasand kertay ho agar yeh tumhen Allah say aur uss kay rasool say aur uss ki raah mein jihad say bhi ziyada aziz hain to tum intizar kero Allah Taalaa apna azab ley aaye. Allah Taalaa fasiqon ko hidayat nahi deta
